test_cases.name: high_quality_720p
test_cases.description: Higher quality with more inference steps

prompts: Summer beach vacation style, a white cat wearing sunglasses sits on a surfboard. The fluffy-furred feline gazes directly at the camera with a relaxed expression. Blurred beach scenery forms the background featuring crystal-clear waters, distant green hills, and a blue sky dotted with white clouds. The cat assumes a naturally relaxed posture, as if savoring the sea breeze and warm sunlight. A close-up shot highlights the feline's intricate details and the refreshing atmosphere of the seaside.

bf16_te.use_case: Improved numerical stability for timestep embeddings

fp8.use_case: Faster inference, lower memory, may slightly reduce quality

fp8_bf16_te.description: FP8 quantized linear layers with BF16 timestep embeddings
fp8_bf16_te.use_case: Best speed with some quality preservation

usage_examples.test_all_precisions: python3 benchmark_script.py --config benchmark_config.json --precision default bf16_te fp8 fp8_bf16_te
